Fault.name: BPEL/BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpel:process> "BPEL" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns3:PollTable" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
